effect.Name: Photoshop Linear Light (Background)
effect.description: (The effect comes from the Photoshop) Burns or dodges the colors by decreasing or increasing the brightness, depending on the blend color. If the blend color (light source) is lighter than 50% gray, the image is lightened by increasing the brightness. If the blend color is darker than 50% gray, the image is darkened by decreasing the brightness
effect.author: Foxioo

parameter.name: /* Foxioo Photoshop Linear Light (Background) Shader | 1.2 (30.06.2024) */
parameter.description: (The effect comes from the Photoshop) Burns or dodges the colors by decreasing or increasing the brightness, depending on the blend color. If the blend color (light source) is lighter than 50% gray, the image is lightened by increasing the brightness. If the blend color is darker than 50% gray, the image is darkened by decreasing the brightness

parameter.name: Mixing
parameter.description: This variable is responsible for the visibility of the effect.
